author: Judith Prakash J (delivering the judgment of the court):
casename: Ong Boon Huat Samuel v Chan Mei Lan Kristine
coram: Chan Sek Keong CJ; Judith Prakash J; Tan Lee Meng J
counsel: The appellant in person; Nicole Loh (Harry Elias Partnership) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Family Law/Matrimonial assets/Division/Property purchased during marriage in husband's sole name after wife pulling out of purchase/Whether such property wife wanting to have no part in amounting to matrimonial asset to be divided between parties upon divorce/Section 112 Women's Charter (Cap 353, 1997 Rev Ed)

Family Law/Matrimonial home/Matrimonial home purchased jointly by husband and wife/Husband and wife paying lump-sum down payment but wife solely responsible for monthly loan payments/Manner in which matrimonial home to be divided between parties upon divorce
